Package com.fdmgroup.CurrencyConverterHan

package com.fdmgroup.CurrencyConverterHan
  • Class
    Description
    BrokeBoiException
    Custom Exception thrown when User has not enough money for transaction.
    Currency
    A POJO class to store the attributes of currencies from the currency JSON file.
    CurrencyList
    CurrencyList class has the attribute ArrayList of Currency obtained from the fx_rates.json file and also contains the HashMap rateList and inverseRateList, both being used in the calculation for conversion.
    NonExistCurrencyException
    Custom exception to throw when the User does not have any currency requested in the transaction
    NonExistUserException
    Custom Exception thrown when there are no Users matching the requested transaction.
    TransactionProcessor
    TransactionProcessor class is a helper class meant to convert the currencies of Users, as well as transcribing the data to a JSON file.
    User
    The User class obtains attributes from the JSON file users.json.
    UserList
    UserList class has ArrayList containing Users and obtains this from the JSON file users.json.
